response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth to you could be even greater. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure it goes to someone who appreciates its true value and will cherish it as much as I have. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
